value.title: Biden to pull U.S. troops from Afghanistan by Sept. 11, sources say
value.excerpt: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Joe Biden has decided to withdraw U.S. troops from Afghanistan by Sept. 11, 2021, 20 years to the day after al Qaeda’s attacks triggered America’s longest war, three sources familiar with the decision told Reuters.
